metadata.title: CVE-2021-43529 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Thunderbird versions prior to 91.3.0 are vulnerable to the heap overflowdescribed in CVE-2021-43527 when processing S/MIME messages. Thunderbirdversions 91.3.0 and later will not call the vulnerable code when processingS/MIME messages that contain certificates with DER-encoded DSA or RSA-PSSsignatures.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
